item.title: BlackRock Paused Fundraising for Latest Asia Private Credit Fund
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- BlackRock Inc. paused fundraising earlier this year for its latest Asian private credit strategy amid its merger with HPS Investment Partners, people familiar with the matter said, adding to uncertainties for the firmâ€™s ambitions for the asset class in the region.
